titleStmt.title: The Leuites reuenge containing poeticall meditations vpon the 19. and 20. chapters of Iudges. By R. Gomersall.
titleStmt.author: Gomersall, Robert, 1602-1646?
Cecil, Thomas, fl. 1630, engraver.

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed "Tho Cecill sculp", with imprint: London. Printed for Iohn Marriott 1628.
"A thanksgiuing for a recouery from a burning feauer", [4] p. at end.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
